WRITING.TITLE: Tomorrow Is My Independence Day From Cigarettes.
WRITING.TEXT: Tomorrow is the day that I quit smoking. For me, for my kid, for my family. I don't need these damn things. I've lived without them and I can do it again

WRITING.TITLE: This sucks.
WRITING.TEXT: I never smoke in the morning because my son is up. First thing this morning when I wake up is I want a cigarette and I wouldn't even be smoking one right now! #128533; I don't know if I can do this..

WRITING.TITLE: I'm really struggling right now. My son is about to go to bed and that's when I would do most of my smoking. I'm so tired of saying I'm going to quit and then going and buying a pack, it makes me feel so weak. I just wish it wasn't so difficult to tell myself no.

WRITING.TEXT: I could understand how the difference in wording could trick your brain. No, I haven't. What is it?

Ok thank you. Yeah, this is the first time I've tried to quit and have support groups on Facebook, a smoke free app and Reddit. I feel much more positive this time around, it's just I already feel like I don't wanna do it. I know I need to do it, just I don't want to. #128577;
Awesome. I'll look into it tomorrow. Maybe I'll get lucky and it will be at my library as well! I appreciate the help.

Thank you for this. I needed to hear it. I've been smoking a little over a year but it's been about a pack a day to a pack and a half a day. The videos would be a good idea, but I'm a hypochondriac so if I see something I'll somehow convince myself I have 3 days to live. #128514;

WRITING.TITLE: I woke up this morning and realized it's been a whole day! I've gone 24 hours cigarette free! And I feel good today and proud of myself! I'm gonna take control of my life this time, cigarettes will not win!
Night Time Sucks
WRITING.TEXT: It's night time again.. #128555; The days I'm good and don't have terrible cravings, but damn the night time. I have to find something to do.. other than eating! I just lost a bunch of weight and I don't want to put it all back on.
I can't justify getting a gym membership because I don't go. I might go for a week or two... I wish I enjoyed working out. #128577;
Which thinking about it now, that's a really silly comment because I would spend almost $9 dollars every day killing myself.
I used to. But I can't find any new ones that I like..

WRITING.TITLE: Yay Guys!
WRITING.TEXT: So so proud of myself. The only thing I've done differently is join support groups like this one and a few on Facebook. I can't say it's just coincidence. Getting notifications from people all around the world telling me I can do it and how they did it and tips and tricks to help me. So thank you guys! #128513; I have only thought of cigarettes twice today. Once this afternoon and once when I decided to write this post. Taking my life back!

WRITING.TITLE: Question time! *stoners!*
WRITING.TEXT: So I'm quitting cigarettes obviously, but I'm still smoking herb and I'm not planning on stopping ever. #128514; Anyways, my questions: What are some of the positive things I'll gain from stopping cigarettes? Will I notice it because I'm still smoking weed? I'm planning on it to not be as exact as most cold turkey quitting stories go because I'm still technically smoking something.
Dude really? That's a super dickhead thing to say.
Yeah. I hardly ever roll, it's pipes or bongs mainly. So no nicotine ever. But you answered exactly what I wanted. #10084; #65039; it can be done!!
Yes! I haven't had a decent nights sleep in 4 days. My legs are super restless! But I try not to complain, I did it to myself I can deal with a week or two of shitty sleep. #128514;
It will!!! Keep it up bro #10084; #65039; #128077; #127995; #128077; #127995; I wake up in a good mood now because I know that I can be stronger than a fucking death stick.

Right?! Now I don't have to wash my hands and change my clothes and hope I don't still smell. I can't believe that I forgot how good I could feel all because of cigarettes. The more days I go without one, the more I see how my whole life was literally revolving around when I was going to get to smoke again. How sad is that?

Go you! I'm on Day 4 almost 5. I love my Mary Jane. #128154; and I feel like a cigarette after would always make her better, but after the first day of no cigarettes, I realized I enjoyed the high sssoooo much more not worrying or trying to speed through the bowl to hurry and get a cig. It's sad that I didn't even see myself doing that. Thanks for the info! #9786; #65039; #128077; #127995; good luck with your journey bro! You got this!
And dude! I can hit the pipe, bong, blunt, joint etc. so much harder since I've stopped! #128525; #128525; #128514; #128514;
I know man. It's sad. Buuut.. there's a happy ending. We learned our lesson and we are stronger for it!
It's all good bro. I'll attribute it to withdrawal rage. #128514; Apology accepted. #10084; #65039; #128154;

WRITING.TITLE: It's been 7 days, 168 hours, 10,132 minutes, and 607,928 seconds since I have had a cigarette! A week #128513; Fuck you cigarettes! #128405; #127995;

I've fucking made it a month guys! It was really hard the first 2 weeks but I stayed strong. I can officially in my mind, call myself a non-cigarette smoker! #10084; #65039; #128293; #128153; #128525;

WRITING.TEXT: You got this. It feels great! #128516;
That #8217;s awesome!! I just hit 3 months myself. Stay strong #128170; #127995;

It #8217;s taken me some time to figure out what works for me. First, it was to acknowledge that failure is another step in the learning process and that everyone does it. Failing is nothing to be ashamed of, it #8217;s quitting that #8217;s shameful. As far as depression, marijuana is what helped me. I tried numerous pills, changed my diet, tried god.. you just have to find what works for you. I also meditate and use hypnotherapy sessions on iTunes before i go to sleep at night and those are surprisingly very helpful.

WRITING.TITLE: I recently started dabbing.
WRITING.TEXT: So i recently started to dab and just there is so so much to have to learn. I #8217;ve tried shatter and that #8217;s about it. What #8217;s the difference between: live resin, budder, crumble, and sauce. I feel like I #8217;m wasting a lot too because there #8217;s always black stuff at the bottom of the bangar when I #8217;m done. Thanks for the help in advance! #128077; #127995; #10084; #65039;

Ok, so a puddle is a good sign. And i have a carb cap but i just throw it on there randomly. I don #8217;t understand what it #8217;s really for.. sorry i know i should know this stuff before i started dabbing but i was so excited! #128514; #128514;

Thanks so much! Yes it makes lots of sense. What i hear is i have to practice dabbing all day today. #128536; #128514; I count about 35 seconds until it starts to get red and then i usually wait til it #8217;s not red anymore which is maybe 3-5 seconds after. So I #8217;ll start playing with my times and count to 8 maybe. Thanks so much for the help!!
I #8217;ve tried the pens and they make my lungs hurt.. #9785; #65039;And there #8217;s two ways to look at it, i feel like a fucking scientist with my torch. #128514; #128514;
I gotcha man. Thanks for the help. #128077; #127995; #9786; #65039;
Just letting you know! I #8217;ve since used your advice and have had some amazing hits and nothing black at the bottom. #128077; #127995; #10084; #65039; Appreciate the help so much.
I #8217;ve started counting and paying attention to how hot the bangar is. I #8217;ve since had some pretty killer hits and no black stuff on the bottom.

WRITING.TITLE: Being an agnostic in a family of Christians is the worst.

WRITING.TEXT: In my case it does. My family are Christians when they want to be now. When i was a kid we went every Sunday and Wednesday whether we cried and kicked the whole way there. It was full of people who did nothing but judge and criticize me and my family. As a result of all of their ugliness, i no longer want them in any part of my life. There is of course a longer story that would make more sense but for this conversation this should work. I now have moved out and have since had a son. He #8217;s almost 2 and they want to take him to a Christmas program at the church that i used to go to. I told them no. I gave them my reasons all of which are valid to anyone but them. My dad called me and asked again if my son could go, i then told him no and went through my reasons again, listing the same exact ones i had previously without slipping up. His response was to call me selfish. I understand that the people at the church are their friends, but i also feel that my parents should respect my reasoning and leave it alone. And without fail when i tel them no i get told don #8217;t you care about your son, you don #8217;t want him to go to hell do you...
Yeah it #8217;s just hard when my son is in the middle of it. And the frustration of letting them be them but them not letting me be me.

I agree with you. But the Bible also teaches so many other terrible things, on top of that, those are basic morals, i don #8217;t need a big scary man threatening me with hell to do what #8217;s right and i don #8217;t feel i need to teach my child that way. The problem i have with any kid in church really is that is the first step to brainwashing. How is a person supposed to have a unique thought about the afterlife etc. if from the day they were born they were forced to be in it, most of the time with out being able to question it. Sounds like a cult to me.. My kid is almost 2.. he won #8217;t comprehend the message that #8217;s being taught so why do i need to force my highly active kid to sit still for an hour and a half for something his mother doesn #8217;t even believe.
I #8217;d agree with you there. Glad that #8217;s not my situation, but i feel like sometimes my mom is that extreme.
Exactly. And they don #8217;t see it because of how far their heads are up their asses.
It makes me happy. I feel like when they laugh at their material, it really represents them and shows they still enjoy what they do.
Good job man! Keep up the good work. It #8217;s hard to lose it and keep it off. You look great!

WRITING.TITLE: Some help or advice would be great lt;3
WRITING.TEXT: A little backstory, I used to self harm in high school, it was for short period of time but my parents did find out. They are aware of my tendency to cut. I haven't done anything since high school and have been relatively happy. However, I went through some severe post partum depression as well as a bad reaction to some weight loss pills I was taking, which resulted in the relapse back into self harm. It's been two years since I have self harmed and my cuts have now healed up but have left some pretty noticeable scars. Anyway, this Fourth of July we are having a swim party at my Grandma's. My scars are on my legs. There are a few people in my family who I'm almost positive have seen them.. but it's still a big step to go out in a bathing suit with all of my family and some friends. My kid, I'm sure, will be swimming and so will everyone else. I would love to get into the water too.. but I'm just scared, I guess? I don't really know what of.. Has anyone else had any similar stories and how did you deal with it? My future plan is to get it tattooed over we just haven't got the funds for that yet..

WRITING.TITLE: Any advice or what you have done or gone through would be great!
WRITING.TEXT: A little backstory, I used to self harm in high school, it was for short period of time but my parents did find out. They are aware of my tendency to cut. I haven't done anything since high school and have been relatively happy. However, I went through some severe post partum depression as well as a bad reaction to some weight loss pills I was taking, which resulted in the relapse back into self harm. It's been two years since I have self harmed and my cuts have now healed up but have left some pretty noticeable scars. Anyway, this Fourth of July we are having a swim party at my Grandma's. My scars are on my legs. There are a few people in my family who I'm almost positive have seen them.. but it's still a big step to go out in a bathing suit with all of my family and some friends. My kid, I'm sure, will be swimming and so will everyone else. I would love to get into the water too.. but I'm just scared, I guess? I don't really know what of..
